html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-00322021-02-05,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  CTA
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Accessible Transportation for Persons with Disabilities Regulations and the Canadian Transportation Agency Designated Provisions Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE ACCESSIBLE TRANSPORTATION FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES REGULATIONS (ATPDR) AND THE CANADIAN TRANSPORTATION AGENCY DESIGNATED PROVISIONS REGULATIONS (DPR) to (1) address minor errors, omissions and inconsistencies in order to ensure clarity and certainty in both the interpretation and the application of the ATPDR; and (2) ensure that DPR related to accessibility continue to be enforceable through administrative monetary penalties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0009 Publication Date: 2021-02-17
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Accessible Transportation for Persons with Disabilities Regulations and the Canadian Transportation Agency Designated Provisions Regulations
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE ACCESSIBLE TRANSPORTATION FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES REGULATIONS (ATPDR) AND THE CANADIAN TRANSPORTATION AGENCY DESIGNATED PROVISIONS REGULATIONS (DPR) to (1) address minor errors, omissions and inconsistencies in order to ensure clarity and certainty in both the interpretation and the application of the ATPDR; and (2) ensure that DPR related to accessibility continue to be enforceable through administrative monetary penalties.
